cause.description:
It is our mission to make out of Duff Beer a real beer which can be bought anywhere, so we raise enough money to supply Duffman with enough Food and Hot Babes
1. Create a real Duff beer
2. Duffman, Oh Yeah!!!
3. Duff Beer must be available in Normal Duff, Duff Light and Blue Duff with the exceptional taste of mint!
cause.mission: make Duff Beer a real and drinkable Beer
cause.name: Save the Duffman
